channel.title: How to portfoward (linksys router)
channel.description:
hi, im rainscap and im going to show you how to portfoward a Linksys router so you can make your Server a No-ip server If you need any additional help go to www.gamerzrus.net
~~~~~~~~~~~~~How to Portfoward linksys router~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Step 1. go to run > Then type Cmd press > ok then Type > Ipconfig and this should popup:
[URL=http://img49.imageshack.us/my.php?image=ipconfigeg9.png][IMG]http://img49.imageshack.us/img49/6493/ipconfigeg9.th.png[/img][/URL]
Step 2. leave that open then find Your Default Ip adress witch will be on the Ipconfig > Then open you internet browser and Type Your default Ip adress in the adressbar and press go then this should pop up
Purpose: Explain how to portforward on linksys router.
Step 1: You will need a router/wireless router. Ok first thing we're gonna do is open command prompt. Once in command prompt we will type in
Code: ipconfig
Step 2: Now that we've done that we will need to type the defualt gateway into our internet browser. Now something should come up asking you for a username and password by default it's Default Admin leave user blank.
step 3: When you linksys wireless homepage popsup hit the applications and Gaming tab. then this will popup:
[URL=http://img49.imageshack.us/my.php?image=thissl5.jpg][IMG]http://img49.imageshack.us/img49/8272/thissl5.th.jpg[/img][/URL]
Step 4. then Make yours look like this :
[URL=http://img66.imageshack.us/my.php?image=this2zr6.jpg][IMG]http://img66.imageshack.us/img66/7898/this2zr6.th.jpg[/img][/URL]
Except Where it says Ip adress 192.168.1.101 Put ur ending numbers after the 1. Those are just mine.
Thats how you port foward a linksys router For further questions rejister at my Forums www.gamerzrus.net
Credits 100% Rainscap
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 20, 2008, 08:37:14 PM[/size][hr]Bump[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 21, 2008, 03:33:32 PM[/size][hr]BUmp bump

item.title: How to portfoward (linksys router)
item.dc:creator: @rainscap rainscap
item.description:
@rainscap wrote:

hi, im rainscap and im going to show you how to portfoward a Linksys router so you can make your Server a No-ip server If you need any additional help go to www.gamerzrus.net

~How to Portfoward linksys router~

Step 1. go to run > Then type Cmd press > ok then Type > Ipconfig and this should popup:

Step 2. leave that open then find Your Default Ip adress witch will be on the Ipconfig > Then open you internet browser and Type Your default Ip adress in the adressbar and press go then this should pop up

Purpose: Explain how to portforward on linksys router.

Step 1:
You will need a router/wireless router.
Ok first thing we’re gonna do is open command prompt.
Once in command prompt we will type in

Code:
ipconfig

Step 2:
Now that we’ve done that we will need to type the defualt gateway into our internet browser.
Now something should come up asking you for a username and password by default it’s Default Admin leave user blank.

step 3: When you linksys wireless homepage popsup hit the applications and Gaming tab. then this will popup:

Step 4. then Make yours look like this :

Except Where it says Ip adress 192.168.1.101 Put ur ending numbers after the 1. Those are just mine.

Thats how you port foward a linksys router For further questions rejister at my Forums www.gamerzrus.net

Credits 100% Rainscap
